reviews.text: SmartLooks Window & Wall Decor- Hunter Douglas SmartLooks Window & Wall Decor- Hunter Douglas 101 S Greenville Ave, Richardson, TX 75081 Make everyday living easier with automated shades that move on your schedule. Contact Smartlooks Window & Wall Decor for your motorized window coverings in Richardson TX.
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Helped me choose the perfect curtains, I could not be happier." "Possibly the rudest people I've ever encountered." "Same day service and very reasonably priced."

We had an outstanding experience with SmartLooks Windows & Wall Decor. As many homeowners know, quality window coverings are an investment, and SmartLooks made the entire process feel worthwhile. Their team offered fair, competitive pricing … More Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you, Brian! Your kind words and positive experience are what we strive to deliver! We are so happy you are pleased with your purchase, and appreciate you trusting SmartLooks with your window covering project.

We had a wonderful experience here!  Valerie was so helpful, and definitely knew all about all the different options, helping to make it easy for us to navigate the colors and options for the Hunter Douglas shade we chose.  Prices are not … More Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you for your order, Joanne! We appreciate you trusting us with your shade purchase, and thrilled it arrived far quicker than originally estimated.

This place is awesome!  We went in on a Saturday to get a blind repaired assuming we would need to grab lunch while they repaired it.  But Tori quickly assessed the part that was needed and fixed the blind within 10 minutes.  Great service and far exceeded our expectations!!!  Thank you Response from the owner Edited 2 months ago So glad Tori was able to quickly get your shade repaired! Thank you for the 5 Star Review! We appreciate it so much!
